flavorText: Gjornersen entertained his followers by taking bets on which would move first—the drowsing land wurm or the frozen goblins.

foreignData.flavorText: Gjornersen nahm immer gerne Wetten darauf an, wer sich zuerst bewegen würde: der schlummernde Riesenwurm oder die festgefrorenen Goblins.
foreignData.name: Gefrorener Äther
foreignData.text: Artefakte, Kreaturen und Länder, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, kommen getappt ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Gjórnersen entretenía a sus seguidores tomando apuestas sobre quién se movería primero: la somnolienta sierpe de tierra o los trasgos congelados.
foreignData.name: Éter congelado
foreignData.text: Los artefactos, criaturas y tierras que controlan tus oponentes entran en juego girados.

foreignData.flavorText: Gjornersen amusait ses soldats en pariant sur qui bougerait le premier : la guivre à demi endormie par le froid ou les gobelins gelés.
foreignData.name: Aether gelé
foreignData.text: Les artefacts, les créatures et les terrains que vos adversaires contrôlent arrivent en jeu engagés.

foreignData.flavorText: Gjornersen faceva divertire i suoi seguaci accettando scommesse su chi si sarebbe mosso per primo... l'indolente wurm di terra o i goblin congelati.
foreignData.name: Etere Congelato
foreignData.text: Artefatti, creature e terre controllati dai tuoi avversari entrano in gioco TAPpati.

foreignData.flavorText: ギョルナーセンは随行者達を、どちらが先に動くか賭けをして楽しませた――眠っているランド・ワームと凍りついたゴブリンと。
foreignData.name: 凍りつく霊気
foreignData.text: あなたの対戦相手がコントロールするアーティファクトとクリーチャーと土地はタップ状態で場に出る。

foreignData.flavorText: Gjornersen entreteve seus seguidores apostando em quem se moveria primeiro o vorme terrestre adormecido ou os goblins congelados.
foreignData.name: Éter Congelado
foreignData.text: Os artefatos, as criaturas e os terrenos que seus oponentes controlam entram em jogo virados.

foreignData.flavorText: Гджорнерсен развлекал своих последователей, принимая ставки на то, кто двинется первым дремлющий земляной червь или замороженные гоблины.
foreignData.name: Замороженный Эфир
foreignData.text: Артефакты, существа и земли, контролируемые вашими оппонентами, входят в игру повернутыми.

foreignData.flavorText: 琼纳生与手下打赌取乐，看看打瞌睡的地亚龙与结冻的精灵会是哪个先动。
foreignData.name: 乙太冻结
foreignData.text: 由对手操控的神器，生物与地须横置进场。

name: Frozen Aether
originalText: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control come into play tapped.

rulings.text: Cards enter the battlefield tapped. They do not enter the battlefield untapped and then immediately tap, therefore they do not trigger any effects due to tapping.
Does not affect cards that phase in.
It applies to cards and tokens that are put onto the battlefield by an effect, as well as ones that are played from the player’s hand.

text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
